name: Wackboy on the insect planet
description:
After escaping the space station Wackboy landed on the Insect planet. Wackboy decided to kill all the insects. Take up your guns and destroy the insect queen.  

 

The modifications I made include 

-adding new levels,

-creating a level with a logical progression 

-creating an endless mode for the game.

Controls

WASD to move

Click to shoot

1,2,3 for guns

I added 4 levels

1. An easy introduction to the game

2. a pit filled with enemies

3 A level where you have to find keys

4. A boss level
